description: JSON schema for the fields of a search document.  Note that awesome search does not support camel case so we have to deviate from the usual naming scheme for properties.

path.description: The JSON string holding the EntityHeader array representing the path to this entity. Storing the cached result of entity/id/path to avoid lookup for all search results in a set.
path.title: Path

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this entity.  A new ID will be generated for new Entities.  Once issued, this ID is guaranteed to never change or be re-issued

parent_id.description: The ID of the parent of this entity

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

created_on.description: The seconds since epoch date this entity was created.
created_on.title: Created On

modified_on.description: The seconds since epoch date this entity was last modified.
modified_on.title: Modified On

created_by.description: The user that created this entity.
created_by.title: Created By

modified_by.description: The user that last modified this entity.
modified_by.title: Modified By

annotations.description: The entity's primary and secondary annotations are stuffed into here so that we can do free text search over them.

boost.description: stuff in this field any extra copies of data that you would like to boost in free text search

references.description: The the id of the entity to which this reference refers

acl.description: All group names with READ access to this entity

update_acl.description: All group names with UPDATE access to this entity

species.description: The species associated with this entity
species.title: Species

disease.description: The disease associated with this entity
disease.title: Disease

tissue.description: Type of tissue for the samples in this entity. Tissue is described by the Synapse ontology concept: http://synapse.sagebase.org/ontology#6501
tissue.title: Tissue Type

platform.description: Chip platform for the samples in this entity
platform.title: Platform

num_samples.description: Approximate number of samples in this entity
num_samples.title: Number of Samples
